q: You are working on building the components using VueJS. Then in which of the following Lifecycle stage of VueJS, runs right before the DOM is patched and is re-rendered. It also allows you to update the cycle and run after data changes are made on your component.
You are working on building the components using VueJS. Then which of the following Lifecycle stage of VueJS, allows you to access your component immediately before and after the first render.
